```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
jeop_data <- readr::read_tsv(file = "jeopardy_clue_dataset-master/master_season1-35.tsv")
```

```{r}
questions <- jeop_data %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(question) %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(num_quest = n(), ave_val = mean(value)) %>% 
  dplyr::arrange(dplyr::desc(num_quest))
```
